item.title: iTerm2 Shell Integration
item.author: Gaux Wang
item.description: iTerm2 shell integration iTerm2 may be integrated with the unix shell so that it can keep track of your command history, current working directory, host name, and moreâ€”even over ssh. This enables several useful features. Install NOTE: first ssh your server Select the iTerm2>Install Shell Integration menu item Select Continue and select the second install way Internet-free Install Select Continue until install finished Features iTerm2 Documentation: Documentation For me, 2 features are very useful:
